channel.title: What should my path and classpath be?

item.title: What should my path and classpath be?
item.dc:creator: @ibarageu ibarageu
item.description:
@ibarageu wrote:

need to know what i should make my code be for jdk6 u10 right now my path is

c:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;

and my classpath is

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
is this right ^^^

Read full topic
item.source: What should my path and classpath be?
